subject: Electric Transmission Week complimentary trial

FREE Trial Offer








You're invited to receive a FREE trial subscription 
                to 
                ELECTRIC TRANSMISSION WEEK, your eyes and ears on all 
                aspects of the North American power grid.

Click 
                here to accept this FREE trial offer.

ELECTRIC TRANSMISSION WEEK provides in-depth 
                coverage of standard market design; regulatory actions and controversies; 
                congestion management issues; regional bottlenecks and their effect 
                on the market; RTO developments; transmission rights; capacity 
                pricing; projects, planning, disputes and much more.

                Your subscription also includes FREE access to 
                SNL's online Information Service for Energy where you can view your current issue, 
                catch up on back-issues and stay on top of the latest news headlines. 
            

                You have no risk or obligation -- just an exclusive opportunity 
                to acquire comprehensive transmission intelligence at no cost. 
               


ACT 
                NOW AND CLICK HERE!

                
ONE 
                SNL PLAZA  •  CHARLOTTESVILLE, VA 22902  •  434.951.7797









This is a promotional email from SNL Financial. If you prefer not to receive messages of this type by email from us, please click here, or reply to this email with "remove" in the subject line. Click here to view our Privacy Policy.
